16 class AppState : public State, public AppController {
17 public:
18  AppState();
19 
21  virtual bool entry_action(void);
23  virtual bool action(void);
24  inline enum Display::animation_type animation_type(){ return _animation_type; }
25  virtual int message(const Data * msg);
26 
28  virtual State * exit_condition(State * slist[]);
29 
30 
31  static int send_animation_type(State * next, Display::animation_type type);
32  static int send_exit_state(State * next, const char * name);
33  static int send_message(State * next, const char * msg);
34 
35  inline void set_exit_state_left(const char * exit_state){ _exit_state_left = exit_state; }
36  inline void set_exit_state_right(const char * exit_state){ _exit_state_right = exit_state; }
37 
39  inline const char * exit_state_left() const { return _exit_state_left; }
41  inline const char * exit_state_right() const { return _exit_state_right; }
42 
43  inline const char * message() const { return _message; }
44  inline void set_message(const char * msg){ _message = msg; }
45  inline enum Display::animation_type animation_type() const { return _animation_type; }
46  inline void set_animation_type(enum Display::animation_type animation_type){ _animation_type = animation_type; }
47 
48 protected:
49  void draw_animation(bool draw_bar = true);
50  virtual bool draw_on_bitmap(MBitmap * bitmap) = 0;
51  bool draw_on_display(void);
52 
53 private:
54  enum request {
55  SET_ANIMATION_TYPE,
56  SET_EXIT_STATE,
57  SET_MESSAGE,
58  };
59 
60  typedef struct {
61  enum request request;
62  union {
63  Display::animation_type animation_type;
64  const char * exit_state;
65  const char * message;
66  };
67  } message_t;
68 
69  enum Display::animation_type _animation_type;
70  const char * _exit_state_left;
71  const char * _exit_state_right;
72  const char * _message;
73 };

virtual State * exit_condition(State *slist[])
Called to check if it is time for a state transition.

virtual bool entry_action(void)
Called when entering state.
AppState::action

Called repeated while in the state.
